title: Gentax
extract: Gentamicine is a widely effective antibiotic, meaning it inhibits the growth of various germs. For this reason Gentax Eyedrops can be used as a local treatment for various eye infections.
extract_html: Gentamicine is a widely effective antibiotic, meaning it inhibits the growth of various germs. For this reason Gentax Eyedrops can be used as a local treatment for various eye infections.
